<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fancy Moves](/Feats.aspx?ID=6334) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Gladiator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=251)

**Prerequisites**
[Gladiator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6333); Expert in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes. You can use Performance to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395).
name: Fancy Moves
